column1: In comments page, in the Reply function, the comment is not being updated and replied
column26:
In the Reply function , comment is not being updated and replied on clicking reply button

Steps to reproduce:

# Navigate to the application 
# In the comments page, navigate to any comment which is to be replied
# Select reply option and a 
reply to comment box appears.
# Edit the comment and select the reply button
# Verify the updated reply is displayed or not

Expected Results:

The updated reply should be displayed on selecting reply button

Actual results:

The updated reply is not displayed on selecting reply button but after refreshing the page it is being displayed

!ss_reply.png|width=50%!

In comments page, in the Quick Edit function, the comment is not being updated
column26:
In the Quick edit function , comment is not being updated on clicking update comment

Steps to reproduce:
1. Navigate to the application 
2. In the comments page, navigate to any comment which is to be editted.

3. Select quick edit option and an edit comment box appears.

4. Edit the comment and select the update comment button

5. Verify the updated comment is displayed or not

Expected Results:

The updated comment should be displayed on selecting update comment button

Actual results:

The updated comment is not displayed on selecting update comment button but after refreshing the page it is being displayed
